main event: An unidentified flying object (UFO) was observed at RAF Station, Upper Heyford on 10 Mar 1961.
interesting points: The object was described as a bright white or yellowish circular shape, possibly 2 feet in diameter., The object appeared to be moving very slowly and seemed stationary to observers., The sighting lasted for around 10 minutes., The tower operator was the first to see the object and notified other observers., No discernable features, sound, or visible propulsion were reported during the sighting.
sighted object: bright white or yellowish circular object
witness description: Tower operator and various air police personnel
